pluginDesc.message: Monitor Jenkins execution results and provide other convenient services.

searchFromJenkinsPlaceholder.message: Enter the Jenkins URLs and enter one in a line, such as: http://127.0.0.1:8080

searchFromJenkinsTips.message: Tips: Type jk in the omnibox, press the space key or Tab to enter the Jenkins Job search mode, and enter the job name to quickly match the corresponding Jenkins Job link.

jobStatsTitleTip.message: Statistics Job information from the following Jenkins.

jobStatsJenkinsPlaceholder.message: Enter the Jenkins/View/Job URLs and enter one in a line, such as: http://127.0.0.1:8080/view/My/

jobStatsNodeParamTip.message: If the Job node is null, it will obtain from the following parameters

jobStatsNodeParamPlaceholder.message: Multiple parameters can be entered, separated by comma (,)

jobStatisticsShowCronTableJobOnly.message: Display only jobs with cron table
